p: For individual models, we can estimate Δ F A, Δ F and Δ T from our AMIP5/CMIP5 surface flux biases and CMIP5 SST biases, which allows us to estimate Δ F R. However, we cannot directly estimate Δ C O or Δ C R. For individual models we also cannot estimate λ F, λ C, R F or R C. We therefore cannot solve the equilibrium mixed layer budget for individual models. We can, however, combine Eqs. M1 to M10 to derive the expressions governing the R1 to R4 regression relationships defined in the main manuscript across the AMIP5/CMIP5 model ensembles.
